title: Franklin to Buy Custom Indexing Firm O’Shaughnessy to Help Personalize Portfolios
sub_head: Bespoke portfolio platforms have caught the attention of some of the world’s largest money managers
body:
Franklin Resources Inc. agreed to buy O’Shaughnessy Asset Management, expanding the investing giant’s bet on portfolio personalization.
O’Shaughnessy manages $6.4 billion in assets, including $1.8 billion through its custom-indexing platform, named Canvas.
